## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | The recommended order size ensures sufficient stock to meet forecasted demand over the next 5 days, considering a margin of error for demand variability. It leverages available vendor order quantities while minimizing excess inventory. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | The player plans to purchase 0 units, which would likely lead to stockouts. This recommendation significantly increases inventory to cover forecasted demand. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~2.5 days                              |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                    |
| Comments                          |  The current stock level is insufficient to meet projected demand, and a large order is necessary to avoid stockouts. This recommendation provides a buffer for demand fluctuations and leverages vendor order quantity options effectively. |
